meanings.definition: The process by which DNA damage caused by ultraviolet light is repaired by visible light.
meanings.sent1: Photoreactivations help fix DNA damage from sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study photoreactivations to understand how cells repair themselves.
meanings.sent3: The DNA was so happy to see the photoreactivations coming to its rescue.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like photoreactivations, bringing light to his dark days.
meanings.sent5: The concept of photoreactivations is like a superhero saving the day for DNA.
